PREREQUISITE.NAME: Memory Check
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Checks for Component Memory Checks

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: Checks for Component Memory Checks

PROBLEM.TEXT: Sufficient Memory Not Available

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you have the sufficient memory to install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Verify Platform
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Verifying if the current platform is supported by the Shiphome used

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the current platform is supported by the Shiphome used

PROBLEM.TEXT: This Oracle software is not certified on the current O/S.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you are installing the software on a certified platform.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Verfiy IP Version
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Verifying the Internet Protocol version

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test the Internet Protocol version

PROBLEM.TEXT: This Oracle software is not certified on the current O/S.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you are installing the software on a certified platform.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Check Env Variable
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Check Environment Variable

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: Check Environment Variable

PROBLEM.TEXT: Sufficient Memory Not Available

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you have the sufficient memory to install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Set Ulimit
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Set ulimit to unlimited

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: Set ulimit to unlimited

PROBLEM.TEXT: Sufficient Memory Not Available

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you have the sufficient memory to install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Check Lib File Existence
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: To check if liblber-2.2.so.7 is present in library path

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: To check if liblber-2.2.so.7 is present in library path

PROBLEM.TEXT: iblber-2.2.so.7 is not present in library path

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you have the sufficient memory to install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Patches
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Are the required patches applied to the O/S?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the the minimum required patches are available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: Some required patches are missing.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: You may actually have installed patches which have obsoleted these, in which case you can successfully continue with the install. If you have not, it is recommended that you do not continue.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: ClusterPatches
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Are the required patches applied to the O/S?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the the minimum required patches are available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: Some required patches are missing.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: You may actually have installed patches which have obsoleted these, in which case you can successfully continue with the install. If you have not, it is recommended that you do not continue.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Packages
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Are the required packages installed on the system?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the the minimum required patches are available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: Some required packages are missing.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: You may actually have installed packages which have obsoleted these, in which case you can successfully continue with the install. If you have not, it is recommended that you do not continue.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: GLIBC
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Required GLIBC installed on the system?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the the minimum required glibc is available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: Required GLIBC not installed.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: You may actually have installed the required GLIBC which have obsoleted this, in which case you can successfully continue with the install. If you have not, it is recommended that you do not continue.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: MinimalKernel
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Check kernel parameters

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the the minimum required kernel parameters are available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The kernel parameters do not meet the minimum requirements.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Update the /etc/system file with the required values, restart the system and perform the install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Kernel
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Check kernel parameters

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the the minimum required kernel parameters are available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The kernel parameters do not meet the minimum requirements.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Update the /etc/system file with the required values, restart the system and perform the install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Security
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Check kernel parameters

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the minimum required kernel parameters are available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The kernel parameters do not meet the minimum requirements.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Update the /etc/system file with the required values, restart the system and perform the install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: Security_Core
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Check kernel parameters

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the minimum required kernel parameters are available on the system.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The kernel parameters do not meet the minimum requirements.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Update the /etc/system file with the required values, restart the system and perform the install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: CPU
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Does the system run on atleast 300Mhz CPU?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the CPU speed meets the minimum requirements.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The system runs on a CPU that is too slow for Oracle software.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure that the system runs on a CPU with the minimum required speed.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: TotalMemory
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Does the system have sufficient physical memory?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the system has sufficient physical memory.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The system does not have sufficient physical memory to perform the install.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Upgrade the memory for your system in order for Oracle software to function.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: AvailableMemory
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Does the system have sufficient available memory?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the system has sufficient available memory.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The system does not have sufficient free memory to perform the install.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Close applications to make sure that the system has sufficient free memory to perform the install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: SwapSpace
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Does the system have sufficient swap space?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the sufficient space is available to perform the install.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The system does not have the required swapspace.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make more swap space available to perform the install.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: OracleBase
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: ORACLE_HOME should not be a parent of ORACLE_BASE

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the ORACLE_BASE environment variable is set to a subdirectory of the Oracle home into which the install is taking place.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The environment variable 'ORACLE_BASE' is set to be a subdirectory of the Oracle home.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Unset the ORACLE_BASE or set it to be a parent of the Oracle home.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: RootAccess
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Does the user have root access?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the the user has root access or not.

PROBLEM.TEXT: You have not confirmed if you have root access. Root acess is required to perform some configuration setup after the install is complete.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure that the you have necessary priviledges to run scripts as root.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: CertifiedVersions
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Is the Oracle software certified on the current O/S?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the Oracle software is certified on the current O/S or not.

PROBLEM.TEXT: This Oracle software is not certified on the current O/S.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you are installing the software on a certifid platform.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: CertifiedVersions JDev
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Is the Oracle software certified on the current O/S?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the Oracle software is certified on the current O/S or not.

PROBLEM.TEXT: This Oracle software is not certified on the current O/S.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Make sure you are installing the software on a certified platform.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: TotalMemory JDev
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Does the system have sufficient physical memory?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the system has sufficient physical memory.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The system does not have sufficient physical memory to perform the install.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Upgrade the memory for your system in order for Oracle software to function.

PREREQUISITE.NAME: AvailableMemoryJDev
PREREQUISITE.EXTERNALNAME: Does the system have sufficient available memory?

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: This is a prerequisite condition to test whether the system has sufficient available memory.

PROBLEM.TEXT: The system does not have sufficient free memory to perform the install.

RECOMMENDATION.TEXT: Close applications to make sure that the system has sufficient free memory to perform the install.
